publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2954 Bob Doris: Steven Taylor, Professional of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Steven Taylor, an employee of Capita Life and Pensions, Glasgow, who was awarded the prestigious United Kingdom-wide titles of Professional of the Year - Agent and Overall Professional of the Year at the 2008 Customer Contact Association awards in Edinburgh; believes that such awards demonstrate Steven’s hard work, commitment, ability and professionalism, and further believes that such an accolade going to an employee of a Scottish-based firm sends out a strong signal as to the quality, skill and dedication of a Scottish-based workforce, which is vital not only in terms of maintaining Scottish jobs but also in expanding Scotland’s jobs base. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Park*
S3M-2954 Steven Taylor, Professional of the Year (lodged on 25 November 2008) Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*

S3M-2954 Bob Doris: Steven Taylor, Professional of the Year—That the Parliament congratulates Steven Taylor, an employee of Capita Life and Pensions, Glasgow, who was awarded the prestigious United Kingdom-wide titles of Professional of the Year - Agent and Overall Professional of the Year at the 2008 Customer Contact Association awards in Edinburgh; believes that such awards demonstrate Steven’s hard work, commitment, ability and professionalism, and further believes that such an accolade going to an employee of a Scottish-based firm sends out a strong signal as to the quality, skill and dedication of a Scottish-based workforce, which is vital not only in terms of maintaining Scottish jobs but also in expanding Scotland’s jobs base. Supported by: Aileen Campbell, Bashir Ahmad, Jamie McGrigor, John Park, Kenneth Gibson, Bill Kidd, Stuart McMillan, Christina McKelvie*, Gil Paterson*
